players_see_self.Name: See YOUR stats?
players_see_self.Hint: If enabled, the player can see their own stats. Recomended On

players_see_players.Name: See OTHER players stats?
players_see_players.Hint: If enabled, the player can see other players stats. Reccomended On

players_see_gm.Name: See GM roll data?
players_see_gm.Hint: If enabled, the player can see the GM's stats. If you are the GM this is useless. Reccomended Off

players_see_global.Name: See GLOBAL roll data?
players_see_global.Hint: If enabled, the player can see the global stats. Reccomended On

players_see_gm_in_global.Name: See GM Stats In Global Roll Data?
players_see_gm_in_global.Hint: GM Dice Stats will not be included in Global Stats Screen unless this is enabled. (This impacts GM global stats button too)

enable_blind_rolls_immediate.Name: Allow blind rolls to be immediately added to player stats
enable_blind_rolls_immediate.Hint: If enabled hidden rolls can be seen by players just by looking at their stats

enable_crit_msgs.Name: Stop All Crit Messages From Being Displayed To chat
enable_crit_msgs.Hint: Empty = Disabled | 20, 4 = Crits for d20 and d4's are printed

types_of_crit_msgs.Name: Select Type of Crits to Display
types_of_crit_msgs.Hint: Choose what crit vales you want to display

enable_streak_msgs.Name: List Die types to have streaks printed to chat
enable_streak_msgs.Hint: Empty = Disabled | 20, 4 = Streaks for d20 and d4's are printed

enable_blind_streak_msgs.Name: See blind streaks
enable_blind_streak_msgs.Hint: If a streak has a blind roll in it its not printed to chat unless this is enabled

player_data_form.streak_blind: Streak has blind rolls. Blind streaks are only available to GM
